column4: @UCLA @IDEPSCA My second year daughter informed me that she will be quitting UCLA. The university that I struggle, but yet pay for. She thinks that she no longer needs an education due to politics and the new living wage. She learned this from a few of your professors. Iâ€™d like a refund.
